Articles.Content:
After long research Moho Files will be releasing the first chapters on The Making History mission builder, But this isn't were you will find it:

It's been in the making for a long time but yeah it's now happening but I'm not releasing it yet! I still have to finish chapter 1 and I want to complete my Expedition Eeloo program before working full on this. Moho it feels underappreciated so that is what this series is for, not as bad as Dres and Vall though... But Moho is hard. I have ever visited it twice soon the be four times with two missions after Expedition Purple is completed in two weeks or so. BUT... I wanted to make a mission reports on the progress on this. The Making history mission builder is something I wanted to try so that is what this post is for. If you have any recommendations on this new series for after the Expedition Eeloo program please do tell
